data.title: Oconee RESA
data.meta_description: Oconee RESA is located in the former Tennille Elementary School building.RESA is an acronym for Regional Educational Service Agency. RESAs (formally CESAs) have been in existence since 1966. The goal of each RESA is to help local school systems meet their educational needs through sharing services across school systems lines
data.text:
To view and/or update your profile, click log in to access your account. You will enter your email address and password. If you have forgotten your password, click forgot password button and the password will be sent to your email address. Oconee RESA does not have access to your password.

Once logged in, follow these steps:

Click your name in the very top right corner of the screen

Click My ORESA Profile

Once your profile loads, click the Edit button in the top right

Update any information

Click Save.

You will also be presented with your profile when registering for classes, therefore you can update information at this time as well.

Watch Video

To register and attend a professional learning class/course, first you must register for the class you want to attend. If this is your first time registering, click create profile. If you have already created a profile, you will enter your work email address and password. If you have forgotten your password, click "Forgot Password" and the password will be sent to your email address. Oconee RESA does not have access to your password.

To register for class, follow the steps:

Click Professional Learning Classes

Click Classes

Click on the class title in "blue" you want to register and attend

Click on the blue "Register" button

The Class Overview will provide information about the class

Choose Payment Method.

Choose Bill Me when you're paying yourself

Choose Bill My Organization when the school or district is paying

Status- This will show you the name of the class you have registered to attend along with the date and time. You will also see the Approval Status.

At this point, your approvers are being notified of your request and you can check status by going to My Area > My Requests.

Watch Video

To register to attend a substitute teacher training class, first you must create an account. If this is your first time registering, click create a profile. If you have already created a profile, you will enter your work email address and password. If you have forgotten your password, click "Forgot Password" and the password will be sent to your email address. Oconee RESA does not have access to your password.

To register for classes, follow the steps:

Click Professional Learning Classes

Click Classes

Click on the class title in "blue" you want to register and attend

Click on the blue "Register" button

The Class Overview will provide information about the class

Review User Information to make sure all information is correct. Click Next

Review and click Submit

Choose "Bill Me" for payment method.

You will receive an email with the link to pay for the class.

Status - This will show you the name of the class you have registered to attend along with the date and time. You will also see the Approval Status.

At this point, you can check status by going to My Area > My Requests.
